html.p: Walking through the throng of lowlife in Harbour Street, not far from the infamous Black Lobster inn itself, you fall prey to one of the notorious pickpockets of Blacksand. You feel your bag of coins grabbed from your belt and spin around just in time to see a scrawny, rat-faced young man darting away down a side-alley. If you want to pursue the thief, click here. If you don't wish to do so, you can head for Lobster Wharf or Weaver Gate, but now you will have no Gold Pieces left. Alternatively, you could cry 'Thief! Stop him!' and hope that one of Lord Azzur's militiamen will help you out.
